channel.title: Heathen AKA - (untitled) [WIP, IDM, dark, wonky, melodic]
channel.description:
[Heathen AKA - (as yet untitled)](https://soundcloud.com/heathenaka/h-aka-s-03-slow-dark-synthwave/s-uz71w) [IDM, dark, wonky, melodic]
Been sitting on this one and haven't touched it for the past two or three months. I want to resume working on it, but wanted to get some feedback/input from y'all first.
It's currently only 2m39s, so it's probably not at its final/full duration.
  So, anyway, thoughts and comments welcome.
  P.S. Yes, the bass is distorting in parts. It's on the list of things to fix.

item.title: Heathen AKA - (untitled) [WIP, IDM, dark, wonky, melodic]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
blakkaz:

If you’re after constructive feedback

Always.

It’s little more than a draft at the moment, so it’s possibly a case of cramming the ideas in ahead of proper development. So, your input is helpful as I’m a little too familiar with it.

It’s likely that I can thin it out as part of the lengthening process.

Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Heathen AKA - (untitled) [WIP, IDM, dark, wonky, melodic]

item.title: Heathen AKA - (untitled) [WIP, IDM, dark, wonky, melodic]
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
I’m a fan of anything dark/synthwave/IDM so I thought there was quite a bit to like here.

If you’re after constructive feedback, I felt too many of the elements were demanding my attention (most noticeably in the higher frequencies). Each had quite a bit of character and are mostly forward in the mix.

My favourite sections were at 1:09 and 1:26 (the most stripped back parts), so maybe a sparser arrangement, or pushing a few things back in the mix, may work?

Food for thought, anyway…

Read full topic
item.source: Heathen AKA - (untitled) [WIP, IDM, dark, wonky, melodic]
